data.name: The magic of three
data.detailed_description:
The Magic of Three - is a hybrid puzzle platformer and match 3 genre. This is a pure puzzle game. Each level is an interesting and difficult challenge. If you like puzzles, then this game is for you


Plot

The magical civilization of stone golems had a trouble, a huge tornado reached their settlement and scattered all the knowledge and wisdom accumulated over the centuries throughout the area. All this was stored on stone energy spheres, or as the golems called them, "Spheres of Knowledge". Many turned out to be in inaccessible places for this civilization. But one young golem with a special gift decided to return what was lost.

features Of the Game


  • Using the skills of the golem and mechanics 3 in a row, you have to complete levels and collect all the "Stone Orbs of Knowledge". For the FULL passage of each level, you have to use your brains, because not everything is so simple.

  • On a level, you can always rewind time. In case of a mistake, you don't have to go through the entire level again. =) Just press the magic "Z" button. And everything will return to normal. So you can not be afraid and calmly experiment.

  • As you progress through the game, you will discover new abilities and new objects, enriching the levels with new colors.

  • For Each Level You Can Get 3 Medals!
    1. For passing the level. (This is usually not difficult if you do not complete the rest of the tasks)
    2. For the collection of all stone spheres.
    3. And for points.

If you are looking for a colorful, light atmosphere and at the same time challenging puzzle, then "The magic of three" will be happy to provide you with its own world, a world full of puzzles.

data.short_description: The Magic of Three - is a hybrid puzzle platformer and match 3 genre. This is a pure puzzle game. Each level is an interesting and difficult challenge. If you like puzzles, then this game is for you. Using the skills of the golem, you have to collect all the "Stone Orbs of Knowledge".
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or comparable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
